EmailTemplate.description: This is the default email alert template invitation to the Survey: Customer Service Trial
EmailTemplate.name: [Send using Workflow] Customer Service Trial
EmailTemplate.subject: Please complete this survey: Customer Service Trial
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please complete this survey at:
{!IF(Contact.Id != null,IF(Case.Id != null,'https://cxn--timbasurveys.na35.visual.force.com/apex/timbasurveys__survey?id=a1A41000001XqViEAK&cId='+Contact.Id+'&case_id='+Case.Id+'&wf=yes','https://cxn--timbasurveys.na35.visual.force.com/apex/timbasurveys__survey?id=a1A41000001XqViEAK&cId='+Contact.Id+'&wf=yes'),'')}
